name: Temple with traps
description:
Go through all the traps of the temple and reach the end.

The game is a top-down puzzle adventure game. In which you need to not only react quickly to events, avoid traps, but also think a lot.
The game has 5 levels with a similar design but with different traps and puzzles.

You need to use the keys WASD to move around the location avoiding traps.

You can both quickly prick from the trap and think over your way in advance so as not to fall into it.

In the game you will be met by various traps, flying arrows, thorns from the ground, monsters.

Your travel time will be recorded on the leaderboard.
